about_the_game:
Welcome to Aquilon — a city where festive cheer fills the streets in anticipation of the Eternal Spark Day! Ready to dive into a brand-new holiday tale set in the magical world of Aquilon?

You play as a seasoned adventurer, fresh from the dark depths of the dungeons, returning to celebrate the Eternal Spark Day with old friends. In the cozy warmth of a tavern, you’ll reunite with familiar faces, share captivating stories, and discover secrets that light up the night with sparks of both magic and passion.

Game Features:

  • A cozy winter holiday atmosphere in a rich fantasy setting

  • A cast of vibrant characters, including familiar faces from the Aquilon series

  • Intimate and erotic scenes

  • Bonus storylines featuring beloved Aquilon characters, revealing new facets of the world

Step into a magical adult adventure and experience a holiday filled with wonder, warmth, and enchantment!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 21. The game contains a large amount of sexual content

name: Aquilon: Love and Lust in the Frost ✨❄️❤️‍🔥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-630
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-630
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
